summary: Increases the size of various creatures to be more realistic.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-1-1381877974.png[/img][/center]
This mod increases the size of some of the creatures that populate the lands of Skyrim, only the size has been changed, combat stats are left to vanilla values.

Wolves:
15% increase, Wolves are now bigger than dogs.

Ice Wolves:
8.7% increase, Ice Wolves should be fierce animals not pups.

Bears:
30% increase, Black Bears are quite small, only pandas are smaller.

Cave Bears:
45% increase, Brown Bears are the biggest in size between all the bear subspecies.

Snow Bears:
40% increase, Polar Bears are just a bit smaller than Brown Bears.

Trolls:
20% increase, Trolls are now bigger than playable races.

Frost Trolls:
30% increase, Frost Trolls are bigger than their standard counterpart.

Mammoths:
50% increase, Mammoths should be huge and now they are.

Giants:
80% increase, Giant Giants.

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-3-1381877974.png[/img][/center]
Download and activate using NMM

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-1-1381878016.png[/img][/center]
Deactivate and remove using NMM

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-2-1381877974.png[/img][/center]
If you find any creature that clip out or glitch because of the new size just let me know and provide the necessary info(location, dungeon maybe a screenshot) so i can go and fix the size accordingly.
